thread.title: Mike McCoy: Latest News, Rumors, Speculation on Chargers HC's Future
thread.title_full: Mike McCoy: Latest News, Rumors, Speculation on Chargers HC's Future

author: Tyler Conway
title: Mike McCoy: Latest News, Rumors, Speculation on Chargers HC's Future
text:
0 Comments 
The San Diego Chargers , potentially staring at a top-five pick for the second straight season, are reportedly ready to part ways with head coach Mike McCoy . 
ESPN's Adam Schefter reported the news (h/t ESPN's NFL Twitter feed). Chargers general manager Tom Telesco had recommended keeping McCoy to ownership. 
The 44-year-old is 27-36 in four seasons with the Chargers. After consecutive 9-7 seasons to begin his tenure, McCoy has gone a combined 9-22 over the last two years. The Chargers are 5-10 heading into Sunday's game against the Kansas City Chiefs . 
More to follow.
